sub_title: IT Consultant & DevOps Expert ➤ I help organizations build and implement IT solutions that continuously improve their ability to deploy, manage, and monitor enterprise-grade business applications
summary:
𝗛𝗢𝗪 𝗜 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗔 𝗗𝗜𝗙𝗙𝗘𝗥𝗘𝗡𝗖𝗘

My greatest sense of satisfaction comes from identifying inefficiencies, data bottlenecks, and security threats and developing solutions that drive business process and operating improvements, enhance customer experiences, modernize legacy systems, and increase profits by launching new products and services.

As an established IT Consultant, I have shaped and executed strategies to help organizations build scalable and agile capabilities that promote IT and business alignments.

Using Agile and DevOps best practices, I have collaborated with cross-functional teams across the application development lifecycle, from ideation to development, deployment, and ongoing management in the cloud and on-premises.

In addition, I engage business stakeholders in the process by understanding their challenges, gathering requirements, and identifying, selecting, testing, customizing, and implementing the right strategies and technologies that achieve value-building goals and maximize technology ROI.

𝗛𝗢𝗪 𝗜 𝗔𝗗𝗗 𝗩𝗔𝗟𝗨𝗘

Having worked with multiple clients in both the public and private sectors, I have acquired valuable knowledge of different IT infrastructures in diverse business settings and multicultural environments.

My leadership has led to outstanding results, including:

➤ Empowering the co-creation of new business apps across the developer spectrum
➤ Deploying scalable public, private, and hybrid cloud solutions that simplify operations
➤ Guiding talented Developers in delivering fit-for-purpose web and mobile apps
➤ Delivering end-to-end process automation that aligns people, data, and systems
➤ Enabling secure data connections between disparate enterprise systems

𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗦

Government, Financial Services, Professional Retail, Healthcare, Oil & Energy, Telecommunications, Transportation & E-Learning

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛𝗡𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗘𝗦

DevOps, DevSecOps, .NET, .NET Core, C#, Java, Mendix, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Agile, SCRUM, XP, DDD, TDD, Visual Studio, Xamarin, Xamarin Forms, T-SQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, DB2, Cognos, RabbitMQ, Windows Server, Red Hat, CentOS, Ubuntu, AS400, Hyper-V, VMware PowerShell DSC, Ansible, Packer, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, SonarQube, Azure, Azure DevOps

𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗡𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝗠𝗘

If you seek an IT Consultant with an entrepreneurial mindset, a proven record of accelerating app delivery, and, most importantly—understands that consulting is about building relationships and solving problems, connect with me or email me directly at taner@tgict.com.

projects.title: Elifba
projects.description:
The goal of the project is to create three Mobile applications for learning to read the Holy Quran.

1. Elifba (The Arabic alphabet)
- iPhone version is now available for download in the App Store:
http://itunes.apple.com/en/app/elifba/id511624524?mt=8

2. Dualar ve Sureler (Prayers and Chapters from the Holy Quran)

3. Tecvid (Rules of recitation)

profile_positions.description:
𝗦𝗖𝗢𝗣𝗘 𝗢𝗙 𝗪𝗢𝗥𝗞

I was referred to this opportunity by a project management contact to build and implement a web-based customer portal in Mendix and its related business and customer management dashboards.

In particular, I have been challenged to develop a solution that would securely transfer data from a LOB car leasing app to a data warehouse system while offering greater customer visibility via dashboard KPIs.

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛𝗡𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗘𝗦

AS/400, IBM Cognos Mashup Services, DB2 for i V7R1, Mendix 7/8/9, Java 8/11, Linux Red Hat
profile_positions.title: Mendix IT Consultant ➤ Creating a Mendix business model and data warehouse application

profile_positions.description:
𝗦𝗖𝗢𝗣𝗘 𝗢𝗙 𝗪𝗢𝗥𝗞

My Turkish language skills and Mendix platform expertise led to this current engagement. I have been serving as the primary technical lead on Mendix-focused projects, specifically—rebuilding a request fulfillment app that would remain compatible with the organization's existing business infrastructure.

I guided 6 Junior Developers in architecture development, including defining the fulfillment request process and workflows and leading build review activities to work towards the deployment and scale of mobile and web-based business applications.

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛𝗡𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗘𝗦
profile_positions.title: Mendix IT Consultant ➤ Leading the rebuilding, testing & deployment using Mendix cloud platform

profile_positions.description:
𝗦𝗖𝗢𝗣𝗘 𝗢𝗙 𝗪𝗢𝗥𝗞

I built, tested, and deployed a unique data capture, cloud-based inventory software solution as part of an ongoing engagement with a client in the professional retail services sector.

This effort involved designing and integrating a real-time wireless feature that enabled the scanning and uploading of critical data, including a product's shelf-life, directly to a business server.

This solution also improved order scheduling and reduced costs associated with sales visits, physical inventory checks, and production delays.

Several years after implementing the solution, I remained on board in a technical advisory role to recommendations on continuous improvement, technical troubleshooting, and maintenance activities.
profile_positions.title: .NET Consultant ➤ Developed, tested & implemented a data capture, cloud-based software tool
DevOps Consultant ➤ Facilitated CI/CD of networking, identity & security policies for IT programs

profile_positions.description:
𝗦𝗖𝗢𝗣𝗘 𝗢𝗙 𝗪𝗢𝗥𝗞

I co-founded this start-up and used my technical skills to design a web-based administrative system and bookkeeping solution for self-employed business professionals.

This experience taught me a lot about business operations and product development. I learned a lot about AI and optical character recognition and embedded these features to create a prototype with the potential to convert paper documents into edible computer files.

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛𝗡𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗚𝗜𝗘𝗦

C#, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, amCharts, JavaScript, XML, XSLT, Visual Studio .NET 2015, T-SQL, SQL Server 2014, Windows Server 2012 R2, Hyper-V, PowerShell DSC, Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2016, WCF, NServiceBus, EventStore, Azure, VSO

volunteer_experiences.description:
For over 10 years, I have fulfilled the role of Chairman for this volunteer-based non-profit organization, which focuses on supporting a variety of poverty alleviation, education, and humanitarian efforts.

In this capacity, I have managed the daily operation of multiple initiatives, including building schools in Africa and Asia and collecting clothing and food items for donations. I have also used my relationship management and networking capabilities to build connections with other non-profits to achieve humanitarian-related goals on a larger scale.
